snippet: The Tribeca Film Festival’s writer-in-residence (and noted amateur “American Idol”-ologist) ranks the five most-talented “Idol” contestants ever. Not necessarily the winners: Just the best.
abstract: The Tribeca Film Festival’s writer-in-residence (and noted amateur “American Idol”-ologist) ranks the five most-talented “Idol” contestants ever. Not necessarily the winners: Just the best.

headline.main: Rank Something! The Top 5 Most Talented 'American Idol' Contestants Ever
headline.print_headline: BONUS FEATURE | Rank Something! The Top 5 Most Talented ‘American Idol’ Contestants Ever
